website_summaries.verdict: Built like the original Rubik's Cube that's been around for generations, but even smoother and faster. For serious Cubers, there is no better choice.
pros: The original design by GAN and Rubik's Cube that brought speed turning to the classic puzzle game
Has tiles, not stickers, and comes with a cube stand
cons: It's the highest-priced Rubik's Cube on our shortlist, but it also outpaces the others with its fast, smooth-moving mechanism

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest & most smooth cube I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have been cmCubing for almost 2 years. I am not a super fast cuber but I am pretty good. "Full CFOP, UNDER 30 SECONDS per solve" before today, my favorite 3×3 was the D-Fantix 3×3 that came in the combo pack with the 2×2, 3×3, 4×4 & 5×5. I bought myself a Rubik's Speed Cube as a birthday present to myself. My expectations weren't high but didn't care cuz it was a great cube to add to my collection but.... It is seriously the beautiful & smooth cube I have ever owned. I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Stinebuck

customer_reviews.title: Spins easily, no issued with it after 8 hours of ...
customer_reviews.text: This cube is so much smoother than the traditional Rubik's cube. Spins easily, no issued with it after 8 hours of solid use. It took a couple hours to "break in" so that it spins very easily. I also like that there are no stickers on this that would peel off over time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: NO STICKERS!
customer_reviews.text: In the Florida heat, leaving a cube with stickers (by accident) in bag or glove box can result in the stickers peeling off when it is jostled around and rubs against other objects, or if it comes in contact with some form of liquid. Therefore, I was looking for a cube without stickers yet still true to the original color scheme. This cube is the perfect solution! I am not a fast cuber like those crazy folks out there, but just prior to writing this review I easily solved this cube in 45 seconds. I am certain I will continue to improve on my speed using this cube. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Reumann

customer_reviews.title: Speedy
customer_reviews.text: After trying to solve my daughter's superstore-version Rubik's cube via Internet tutorial I realized just how stiff it was and cumbersome to do the patterns the tutorial specified. I bought this one and it's definitely a step up from the standard version. Super smooth and fast. It feels solidly built and I haven't had any problems with it. I'm not an expert Rubik's cube solver, but for casual solving pleasure this cube fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Wing

customer_reviews.title: My first Rubik’s Cube since I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Rubik’s Cube since I was young & it has been great! It moves fast, has been durable, was great for my 7 year old daughter to play with as well & has been nothing but fun since I got it nearly 4-5 months ago! I am a 34 y/o beginner-of-Cubing person, & in my humble opinion. This has been a GREAT Product...I don’t intend on being any faster than my thus-far record of ~30 seconds, but this Cube has held up & been magnificent as my very first in MY newly-discovered-world of Cubing adventure(s). It surpassed my expectations & continues to.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Best cube
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered about 5 cubes from amazon, yes I have a problem I know, this one is the best. Moves smoothly, has play. I own 2 speed cubes, this one is nicer. 18 bucks, a lot more than the others, but well worth it. Im gone buy more of this one. You will breer very happy with this one. I play with it for hours an extra 10 bucks for a better cube is a small price to pay for having the best cube.
customer_reviews.author: Berneymc

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With My Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This cube is perfect for anyone who is looking for a looser version of the original, and beginners who want to practice to solve the cube faster. Sometimes I get anxious that the looseness of it will cause it to fall apart in my hands, but it still has yet to do that, if it even will which I doubt because this is an official Rubik's brand cube. It makes turning much smoother and more comfortable than the original because the original can have varying tightness, making it only good for learning. THIS one, however, is perfect for solving quickly, and now my record is 1:34 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Decent cube
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money, but if you are used to a magnetic cube, this might irritate you. I have been using a CuberSpeed GAN 356 Air SM 3x3x3 Magnetic for over a year and I love it. I bought this just to have a cheap cube to travel with - but compared to the magnetic Gan it is night and day. I don't even use this one honestly, but if you are a beginner transitioning from a stiff traditional cube, this might be good
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 3 (for 2 parents, 1 child), and have had now problems. I'm mid-40's now and love my Rubik's Cube as much as when I was a kid. Only difference now is that I can get this smooth, "speed" version, whereas when I was kid,my mom got me the stiff, cheaper version. Forget a fidget spinner, get a Rubik's, whenever I'm bored or anxious, I can grab my cube and woosah. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: J & O

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Rubik’s cube out of three
customer_reviews.text: I own four of these. After I broke my original terrible clunky original I got as a kid I needed a replacement. Took me 9 years to solve it but now I can solve a scrambled one in 1minute 17seconds avg. I got a magnetic one Kylin M V2 and a small stickerless one. Both feel really cheap. This one however looks like the original and isn’t light and cheap. It’s got these nice tiles so it won’t slip out your hand. My favorite cube and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderfully well created cube. And it's totally useless unless you're in great light
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and fast cube. The yellow and white however are almost identical making it pointless. I had to get a sharpie and a flashlight just to try and solve it. I will admit I don't have the best eyesight but I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Parrish lee

customer_reviews.title: easy to use - very smooth turning - quiet - Faster to solve and accidently scramble.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Rubik's Cube many years ago - it was one of the old noisy, squeaky, hard-to-turn versions. This one resolves all those issues. BUT it still doesn't solve itself. You still need to solve. Just makes it easier to turn the colors and faster to screw it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this speed cube. It was one of her favorite Christmas presents. It is really smooth and pretty cool how you can turn the corner pieces although that is s sort of like cheating! Much more smooth than the traditional Rubiks cube! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Gid's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Speed Cube - Let's Go
customer_reviews.text: This is the speed cube if you want to cut down your time and you are actually practicing cubing. I've tried a few others and honestly this is hands down the best one. Incredible build, durable and super faster when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low price for great rubix!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I have had this rubix for about a year now and I love it! My brother could write a review about it because he has spent so much time with it, but here I am writing one. Ok so the best thing is it spins well and the durability is great! if you need one then get this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: pen name 13

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY like this cube
customer_reviews.text: When I got this cube I was still very new to Rubik’s cubes. I was getting annoyed at how hard it was to move normal cubes while I was trying to figure it out. It’s fantastic. I do not have a lot of experience as I said before but the easy of turning right out of the box was perfect for me. I have cube lube but haven’t even needed it up this point and I use it at my desk almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It's a cube with a lot of colors. Much fun.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Rubik's I had when young. Bought this for my 2 year old. He chewed on it. I guess it worked well. It entertained him, so that's a win. But seriously, it's a Rubik's cube. Built well. Twists and turns quickly and with precision. You know what this is. It does what it does. Not sure about durability when thrown at wall, you'll need to test that yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lan Review Man

customer_reviews.title: Buy this cube for a smarter kid!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a math teacher who gives extra credit if you can solve the cube. After about a week of trying, my son had it down pat. Unfortunately, our store bought cube would always hang up and was sometimes difficult to turn which was preventing him from passing math! I buckled and bought him this amazing speed cube and not only is he now passing math, he is working on the time space continuum. If you want a super smart kid, buy this cube.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with the rubric cube so I always had one around. My son started to take interest in it and we had purchased this for him. Let me tell you, this cube is super fast and easy to use. If you want to be a speed cuber look no further. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Spellbounds13

customer_reviews.title: Good cube, moves easy!
customer_reviews.text: Good cube, moves easy. If you’ve used cheap knock-offs, you appreciate this one. Used by many college students who often comment, “oh this is a good one!”.
customer_reviews.author: buyer081612

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great colors, perfectly adjusted.
customer_reviews.text: A really nice speed cube. I have been spinning it daily for the past couple of months and it is still tight and clean. Couldn’t be happier with it. Everything is perfectly aligned and adjusted. A pleasure to spin.
customer_reviews.author: AZOT

customer_reviews.title: Easy cube
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for one with magnetic corners but this cube flips easily and doesnt over turn. U can cut corners quite well. Definitely the best 3x3 ive owned. Only if they did larger cubes with this speed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Definitely smoother than the original
customer_reviews.text: My 11yr old son says this speed cube is much smoother and faster than his original rubik's cube. Sometimes it turns too fast and he overshoots, but he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this after watching a video of a 3 year old doing it... I thought "surely it can't be that hard". I gave it a solid 3 hours of twisting and turning before I gave up and went online to find a tutorial! This cube is awesome and turns easily. It is durable enough for me to take to the gym and use while on a stationary bike to make the time go by faster!
customer_reviews.author: Big Marecat

customer_reviews.title: Great cube for price
customer_reviews.text: Great reasonably priced speed cube. Good motion and smooth. My son has gotten down to 54 seconds with this cube. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Be-More

customer_reviews.title: High quality cube, indeed for speed.
customer_reviews.text: Best rubik's cube I've ever used. Been able to cut my time quite a lot with it. It's also very quiet, and rarely gets stuck, even not for a second. came well lubricated. Only downside is that it's not magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: Ronen

customer_reviews.title: Good cube, but no tensioning tool and different sets of springs, only yellow springs.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good cube. Turns nicely, and it is basically a Gan but with no magnets. It didn't come with any springs except the 6 yellow ones inside the cube. It also didn't come with the tensing tool so I ended up using pilers to turn the springs to my liking. Corner cuts pretty well, but not as well as a Gan. Overall a good cube.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: So smooth
customer_reviews.text: Loving this cube! It turns so smooth and easy! I’ll definitely improve my solve time with this!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen Brown-Eddings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like it more than my Gans 356 Air UM. Flows excellent and uses tiles instead of stickers so it's very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bird up!
customer_reviews.text: Best cube that I own. I does not feel cheap. There are no stickers but tiles that ever so slightly protrude from the cube. I’m not a speed-cuber; I just use them as like a fidget spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Frogmouth77

customer_reviews.title: fun speed cube
customer_reviews.text: My son is getting into Rubix Cubes and loved the speed of this better than other ones that were supposed to be fast. Spins well and excellent condition!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the kid wanted for his next rubix competition!
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and lasting product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, no cheap plastic smell. So far stands up to a lot of "abuse" already. My little girl loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald W

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: We used this cube for a few months and it’s starting to get really crinkles so when you buy make sure you also buy some Rubix cube lube
customer_reviews.author: Sapna Bafna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Every time my son turns it the pieces pop out! Tired of fixing it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin S

customer_reviews.title: Great speed cube
customer_reviews.text: My kid wants to increase his time on cube, this cube is perfect match for him.
customer_reviews.author: Cool buyer

customer_reviews.title: very nice cube
customer_reviews.text: very clean movements and nice ergonomic feel. A lot of compliments from other folks.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Best cube I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Pieces turn very smoothly. Great for arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good price,  good product!
customer_reviews.text: Until this, I hadn't touched one since the 70's. This is well made. Flexible. Much improved from what I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Yokozuna

customer_reviews.title: Great Cube for Speed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my thirty year old son who has become obsessed with solving the cube in less than two minutes. It’s on his “bucket list.” He really likes the way it turns so smoothly. He has almost reached his goal on a few occasions. I highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E. Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Best Rubik’s Speedcube
customer_reviews.text: The best Rubik’s brand cube and one of my favorites among all the brands. Fast, stable, durable, satisfying. Should be in everyone’s collection.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Buttery Smooth!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buttery smooth puzzle! Highly recommend for beginners as well as intermediate cubers! I like supporting the Rubik’s brand and this is by far the best product they’ve made!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for a 5 year old genius ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a 5 year old genius but it was not interesting to him. Maybe too difficult
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hand

customer_reviews.title: Love the speed cube
customer_reviews.text: It’s the real deal. My son loves this and it’s helped him get super fast in solving the cube.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase! It combines the Rubik's and GANZ. My son liked his new speed cube.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Daughter likes it . I like the fact that it doesn't make as much noise as a normal Rubik's cube
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s very fast but broke down after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cube, different feel
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this cube, it has a good feel and a unique look. It spins very smoothly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben O.

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and easy on the fingers
customer_reviews.text: Cube has smooth rounded edges and no stickers. Very smooth and easy on the fingers. Great improvement over the original. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Al Meakin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Son uses every day!!!
customer_reviews.text: It knocked several seconds off of my sons time to finish cube.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product well packaged has fast shipping the cube is small and moves freely I would recommend buying for a child.the colors are on actual blocks and not stickers
customer_reviews.author: Brittny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, shipped as expected. Enjoying learning some tricks and incorporating it into the show.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron F.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic faces, not stickers!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easily the cube moves and how flexible it is. I've been solving these for a long time, this is the best cube I've ever had. My others are hard to move, they bind up, the stickers wear away, and fray. Not this cube though!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Warren

customer_reviews.title: Too smooth :)
customer_reviews.text: The cubes rotate so fast, it makes game more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Raut

customer_reviews.title: I’m a total nerd
customer_reviews.text: My knowledge of the entire Star Wars franchise make dem panties drop....
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This cube is amazing! It takes a little getting uesd to but its by far the best cube in my collection.
customer_reviews.author: John Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Quick turning cube
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! My son loves it! Very easy to turn. He could solve it very quickly. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cube
customer_reviews.text: Very good cube for this price and very original design.
customer_reviews.author: Gor

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth, corner cutter
customer_reviews.text: New to cubing and i habe two other 3X3s but this is smooth as butter comapired to the otjer 2.
customer_reviews.author: rudolph l Justinich

customer_reviews.title: Nice cube
customer_reviews.text: It very nice cube, I buy it for my son, hi is very happy, old cheap cube isn't compatible
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son after we tried several brands. Super fast and for the price I think it's the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speed cube
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good cube it’s smooth no magnets which is up to you If it good or bad corner cutting it great
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: A LOT OF FUN
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS, STILL TRYING TO GET THE COLORS BACK WHERE THEY BELONG . BUT ITS GREAT FOR RELIEVING STRESS , I THINK LOL.
customer_reviews.author: TKR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift item.
customer_reviews.text: Durability is not yet known. It is too soon to say as to how long will it last.
customer_reviews.author: s k.

customer_reviews.title: Very very very very good over all
customer_reviews.text: It is a great cube it is really fast and smooth o even got my best to on it for solving it is great I suggest it

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect
customer_reviews.text: The movements are so smooth and fast absolutely the best cube i have ever used

customer_reviews.title: It's not 3.15 inches on a side, only about 2.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't it be nice if Amazon required sellers to stop giving false information?
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: The best 3x3 cube
customer_reviews.text: I tried multiple cubes. This is the best. Its is smooth, durable and great for beginners. Actually great for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ji Peop

customer_reviews.title: love that the colors are apart of the piece
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth, love that the colors are apart of the piece, not just stickers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Bag or Tensioning Tool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cube with prompt delivery. My only complaint is that it didn’t come with either the cloth bag or tensioning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G Williams

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE Missing items!
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly disappointed in this purchase... It did NOT come with the bag OR the tensioning tool! The cube is great but just buy it from Rubik's or Gan, this seller only supplyed the cube nothing more... Will NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

product_meta.title: CuberSpeed Gans Speed Cube 3x3 Speed Cube GAN RSC 3x3x3 Speed Cube (2020 Version with Gan Logo)
feature_bullets: The RSC 3x3 cube has brilliant Corner-Cutting performance close to the top level speedcube. Anti-POP, anti-crack, endurable. Tension adjustable, comes pre-lubricated and tensioned
All surface tiles are made with circular bead and are polish with high-level craft, Never scratch your fingers. Anti-scratch, NO need a cube-protact bag any more

Powered by GAN technology, the new RSC magic cube is made with Ganscores, making them strong, stable and handfeel tunable. Derived from GAN Cube technology, Apply GES Elastic System. The GES can be changed easiliy
Genius tile-plugin design with excellent speed, guides you to top-level speedcubing. The cube uses high quality Tile-Plugin design, With Utra-strong conjunction structure, It's impact resistance
Perfect Christmas Gift / Birthday Gift for kids. This classic puzzle game will never go out of style.
